content: I'm trying to increase my social media presence, especially on Instagram. I've been using hashtags like #sustainabilityliving and #ecofriendlyproducts, and I've seen some engagement. But I'm not sure which other hashtags I should be using to reach a wider audience. Can you give me some suggestions? By the way, I recently participated in a social media challenge using the hashtag #fitnessmotivation, and I gained 15 new followers on Instagram, which was a nice boost!
